item.title: I-240 East/US-70 East at Exits 4A and 4B
item.description: I-240 East/US-70 East at Exits 4A and 4B. Exit 4A (Left) - Future I-26 West/US-19/US-23/US-70 West/UNC Asheville/Weaverville/Woodfin. Exit 4B - Patton Ave./Downtown. Continue ahead for I-240 East/US-70 East/ Expressway. I-26 becomes Future I-26 before this intersection because parts of the highway are not up to interstate standards.

item.description: US-19/US-129/GA-11 North/GA-180 East at GA-180 junction. Turn right to continue east on GA-180.

item.title: US-19/US-129 North/GA-180 East Approaching GA-180
item.description: US-19/US-129 North/GA-180 East approaching GA-180. Turn right to continue east on GA-180 towards Brasstown Bald. Continue straight for US-19/US-129 North to Blairsville.

item.title: US-19/US-129 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance maker on US-19/US-129 north. Distance to Blairsville and Murphy (NC).

item.title: US-19/GA-9 North at US-129 - Lumpkin County
item.description: US-19/GA-9 North at US-129 in Lumpkin County. Turn left for US-19/US-129 North; right for US-129 south. GA-9 north ends here.

item.title: US-19/GA-9 North Approaching US-129
item.description: US-19/GA-9 North approaching US-129 in Lumpkin County. Turn left to continue north on US-19/US-129 for Blairsville and Brasstown Bald; right for US-129 south to Helen and Cleveland. GA-9 north ends here.

item.title: End Bus. US-19 at US-19/GA-60/GA-9 - Dahlonega
item.description: End Bus. US-19 at US-19/GA-60/GA-9 in Dahlonega. Turn right for US-19/GA-60/GA-9 South to Gainsville and Cleveland. Turn left for US-19/GA-60/GA-9 North to Blairsville and Suches.

item.title: End Bus. US-19 at US-19/GA-60/GA-9 - Dahlonega
item.description: End Bus. US-19 at US-19/GA-60/GA-9 in Dahlonega. Turn right for US-19/GA-60/GA-9 South to Gainsville and Cleveland. Turn left for US-19/GA-60/GA-9 North to Blairsville and Suches.

item.title: US-19/GA-60 North at GA-9 - Dahlonega
item.description: US-19/GA-60 North at GA-9 in Dahlonega. GA-9 north joins US-19/GA-60 north to Turners Corner.

item.title: US-19/GA-60 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-19/GA-60 North. Distance to Dahlonega and Ellijay.

item.title: US-19/GA-400 North at GA-115 and GA-60
item.description: US-19/GA-400 North at GA-115 and GA-60 in Lumpkin County. GA-400 north ends here. Turn left for US-19 North/GA-60 North; right for GA-60 south. Continue straight for GA-115 East.

item.title: US-19 North/GA-400 North at GA-60 and GA-115
item.description: US-19 North/GA-400 North at GA-60 and GA-115. GA-400 north ends here. Turn left to continue on US-19 North and for GA-60 north to Dahlonega. Turn right for GA-60 south to Gainsville. Continue straight for GA-115.

item.title: US-19 North/GA-400 North Approaching GA-115 and GA-60
item.description: US-19 North/GA-400 North approaching GA-115 and GA-60 in Lumpkin County. US-19 North joins GA-60 north through Dahlonega.
